entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6 except plus 2 over western sections.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 6 except plus 2 over western sections. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
